sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhāng zhuōzi shì mùtou zuò de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette table est faite de bois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This table is made of wood.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng cáiliào yǒu hěn duō yòngtú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce matériau a de nombreuses utilisations.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This material has many uses.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le paysage ici est très beau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The scenery here is very beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ hěn xiǎngniàn wǒ de jiārén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma famille me manque beaucoup.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I miss my family very much.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Grand-mère adore son petit-fils.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Grandma loves her grandson dearly.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La poste est à côté de la banque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The post office is next to the bank.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'enfant ira à la maternelle l'année prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The child will go to kindergarten next year.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime manger du maïs grillé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to eat roasted corn.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez entrer votre mot de passe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please enter your password.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shuō de huà hěn yǒu dàolǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce qu'il dit est très sensé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What he says makes a lot of sense.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La population de la Chine dépasse 1,4 milliard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China's population exceeds 1.4 billion.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家工厂需要大量原料。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngchǎng xūyào dàliàng yuánliào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette usine a besoin de beaucoup de matières premières.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This factory needs a lot of raw materials.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te souhaite bonne chance !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Good luck to you!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'approuve ta suggestion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I agree with your suggestion.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 战争给人们带来了痛苦。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhànzhēng gěi rénmen dàilái le tòngkǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La guerre apporte de la souffrance aux gens.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: War brings suffering to people.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū kěyǐ zuòwéi cānkǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre peut servir de référence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book can be used as a reference.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Une rafale de vent souffle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A gust of wind blows over.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他们为这件事争论不休。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen wèi zhè jiàn shì zhēnglùn bùxiū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils n'arrêtent pas de se disputer à ce sujet.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They argue endlessly about this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette politique cible les jeunes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This policy targets young people.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise va organiser la réunion annuelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company will hold the annual meeting.
